Although the above circular is primarily for appointment at PIU level, keeping in view of large scale vacancies in the cadre of Manager (Tech) at Head Quarter; it is been decided that the provision of appointment of Site Engineer (with Graduate in Civil Engineering) may also be extended at HQ level in order to strength the need of the officers. The guidelines in this regard are as outlined below: The appointee will be designated as Contract Engineer (HQ), while working at HQ who will report to GM(T) at HQ: Contract Engineer (HQ) may be engaged only in case of absolute necessity, requirement of which shall be assessed by the concerned CGMMember at HQ. (iii) The following   eligibility criteria and consolidated emoluments shall be applicable Contract Engineer (HQ): Post Consolidated Other Benefits Educational Emoluments Qualification/Experience Contract Rs.22000/- per diem Holding Degree in Civil Engineer per month allowance Engineering with more than (HQ) Rs. 100/- one year's experience Cont ..2 # # 7 NHAL 28th day
